column2: You elect to voluntarily step down from rule and surrender all your titles to your heir. Once abdicated, you will be unable to inherit any further titles.
column3: You elect to voluntarily step down from rule and surrender all your titles to your heir. Once abdicated, you will be unable to inherit any further titles.
column4: Sie treten freiwillig von der Herrschaft zurück und geben alle Ihre Titel an Ihren Erben ab. Sobald Sie abgedankt haben, können Sie keine weiteren Titel mehr erben.
column6: You elect to voluntarily step down from rule and surrender all your titles to your heir. Once abdicated, you will be unable to inherit any further titles.
